install.name: JoomFish-Language Selection
install.author: Joom!Fish Project
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2003 - 2012, Think Network GmbH, Munich. All rights reserved.

param.name: type
param.label: Appearance of language selector
param.description: Define how the selector should be generated.
param.option: Drop down of names with current language flag

param.name: show_active
param.label: Show active language
param.description: Select wether the active language should be shown or not

param.name: inc_jf_css
param.label: Include Joom!Fish CSS
param.description: Tells the module if the module Joom!Fish CSS should be included or not.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache_href
param.label: Cache href translation
param.description: Select whether to cache the result of the routing of the translated URL
